plot: Donald Duck, in a battleship made of ice, goes to war against his three nephews, who fight back from their ice fort.
title: Donald's Snow Fight
plot_es: Donald Duck, in a battleship made of ice, goes to war against his three nephews, who fight back from their ice fort.
plot_en: Donald Duck, in a battleship made of ice, goes to war against his three nephews, who fight back from their ice fort.
